item.description:
Join us for a mythical and symbolic exploration of the MFA's Egyptian Collection.
We will explore some of the great myths and mysteries of Egypt, as well as discuss the unique perspective of the Egyptians on life and death and the their role within the universe.

We will meet in the newSharf Visitor Center between the newly opened Fenway Entrance and the Rotundra on the first floor.
We would like to begin at 6:45pm sharp so please arrive a little early.
While the admission to the MFA is free, please bring $5.00 as a charge for the tour.

group.name: Practical Philosophy -- Application of Timeless Wisdom

item.name: MFA TOUR OF EGYPTIAN COLLECTION -- THE MYSTERIES OF EGYPT
